job_details.Vacaturetitel: Big Data Engineer for AI Training
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
job_details.full_text:
Big Data Engineer for AI Training

Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on using AI models to write better code by crafting and evaluating questions and code generated by AI. It does not involve building, training, fine-tuning, or deploying AI models, nor does it require deep technical expertise in AI development. The role is primarily about providing human feedback to train AI models, which aligns with the definition of 'Ambiguous' as a role that primarily focuses on the use of AI tools to enhance productivity or assist in tasks, rather than core AI development.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves 'train AI models' by 'Crafting and answering questions related to computer science' and 'Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models'. While not building models from scratch, this directly contributes to the training process of generative AI models.
The core activity described is 'Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models', which is a direct input into the model training process.
job_tasks.phrase: Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models

job_tasks.justification: Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models is a form of feedback that directly influences and improves the AI model's performance during its training or fine-tuning phase.
job_tasks.phrase: Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models' and 'talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models', implying a need for general coding skills, though not for building the AI system itself.
The description mentions 'talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models', indicating that general coding proficiency is a requirement for the role.

soft_skills.phrase: no requirement for previous AI experience
